title: GoHighLevel CRM Specialist (Setup & Automation Expert)
job_overview:
We’re looking for an experienced GoHighLevel (GHL) specialist to help us fully set up and optimize our CRM, funnels, and automations for a fast-growing digital marketing agency.

If you’re someone who knows GoHighLevel inside-out, can plan and build automations, and loves making systems more efficient—this role is for you!

Key Responsibilities:
-Complete CRM and pipeline setup in GoHighLevel
-Build and refine funnels, landing pages, and forms
-Plan and implement automations and follow-up workflows
-Integrate with email, SMS, and other marketing channels
-Advise on best practices to streamline client onboarding
-Collaborate with our team to customize GHL for our services

Requirements:
- Proven experience working with GoHighLevel
- Ability to set up accounts from scratch
- Strong understanding of funnels, automations, and integrations
- Excellent communication and documentation skills
- High attention to detail and ability to meet deadlines
- Familiarity with agency processes a plus

Bonus / Preferred:
- GoHighLevel certification (if available)
- Ability to share a video introduction explaining your GoHighLevel experience
- Examples or screenshots of past GHL setups you’ve built

Rate & Hours:
- Rate: $4.50–$11 USD per hour (depending on experience and skills)
- Flexible hours; project-based to start, with potential for ongoing work

How to Apply:
Please send:
- Your resume or portfolio with relevant GoHighLevel experience
- A short video introduction about your background and GHL expertise (2 to 3 minutes)
- Any certificates or proof of training
